tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  HILARIOUS
comments: Beth is amazing! Her classes are very easy and all you really have to do is show up. She often cancels class or has us go on a "field trip" instead. Assignments are simple and often fun and she is not a tough grader. One of the best professors I have had so far.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Beth is a great teacher! The worst part about her is she teaches a finite number of classes.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Beth is awesome in any and all of her classes. Highly recommended.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Beth is an incredible person and very good professor. ANY of her classes are worth taking. She makes everything interesting.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Best teacher ever! Take any class with her. She keeps the class entertaining and talks about great topics!
